SEARCH
Package com.peaslimited.shoppeas.service.implementation

Class TransactionsServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.peaslimited.shoppeas.service.implementation.TransactionsServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TransactionsService
@Service public class TransactionsServiceImpl extends Object implements TransactionsService
Implementation of the TransactionsService interface that handles operations related to transaction functionality. This service provides methods to retrieve, add, and update transaction items.
